subject: Adapting to the needs of the Tizen 3.0 and Cynara initial version
commitMessage:
Adapting to the needs of the Tizen 3.0 and Cynara initial version

Removed *.dac files, not WRT files, erased *.smack files

Change-Id: I23c24e095d85fb718169ff2742514fd69ee3a5a5
Signed-off-by: Zbigniew Jasinski <z.jasinski@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Code-Review-2

- Empty files only
- WRT files only
- WRT_$PERMISSION_NAME.smack files only

Patch Set 2: Code-Review+1

Is this package going to stay? If so it would be good to move it eventually to Tizen 3.0 compliant location e.g.
platform/core/security/smack-privilege-config
(projects under framework/* directory are supposed to be for Tizen versions < 3.0)
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.
